name: YuddhBhoomi: the epic war land
description:
Play the most graphically advanced game in its genre. Become a true legend in this epic war land by living the perfect Indian mythological dream known as YUDDHBHOOMI.

Think on your feet, train army, build up defenses, upgrade and utilize resources smartly to lead your warriors to victory against the enemy.

REGULAR FEATURES:
● Build, upgrade and nurture your village and raise an invincible kingdom
● Train vicious fighters (Dhanush dhari, Talwar Baaz, Garuda, Raka, etc.)
● Strategize your defences (Toap, Dhanush Dhari, Ghatak Gulel, Baroodi Bomb etc.)
● Use various astras (Lakshya Bhedak, Brahma Astra etc.) to take down your opponents
● Join Sangathans of players across the world and rule together
● Practice and complete single player battle trails
● Collect trophies and head the leaderboard

The game is free to play. But, you may surpass other kingdoms by buying asharfis/coins within the game.
